title: So I tried to lose today.
body:
For the first time in over 3000 ranked games i purposely played like it was my first day without seeming intentional.

2 mins in my team gets 2 kills on the enemy.

16 mins in the mid ryze on my team is 20-1

top riven on my team gets a pentakill before we end the game at around 22 mins.

i have never ever been carried so damn hard in all of my 3000 games TRYING my absolute best to win every game.

I play one game with the intention to lose for testing purposes and my team absolutely decimates the enemy team while im trying to force a loss. I even tried to surrender at 20.

The enemy team got slaughtered worse by my team than the other 3000 ranked games when I was trying my best to play like my teammates to do me.

replies.body: (Insert rollface on keyboard for pentakill joke about Riven) xdddd
3000 ranked games and still you suck. isnt it time to try something else? maybe something you suck a little less at?

> [{quoted}](name=Homura Akemi,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=8IA6va0a,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-04-11T05:48:49.481+0000)
>
> 3000 ranked games and still you suck. isnt it time to try something else? maybe something you suck a little less at?

You mean like getting to masters in sc2 in under a year?
Yeah he probs meant something like that or potatoe.. Idk I'm still counting my fingers
I don't get why you're commenting, 3 seasons and roughly 1355 games and you're still silver.
pumahs knight in shining armour is here l3l. vry gud. defend ur lil beech nig

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=8IA6va0a,comment-id=0004000100000000,timestamp=2015-04-11T13:16:46.847+0000)
>
> He has a point though.

Has been the only one to point out that I have a point so far...

Pretty sure it was less "defending" and more just pointing out that you're an idiot.

Pretty sure...
A person has the right to waste their own time in any way they wish.

People do not realise how much of a team game this is.

By myself I cannot manage to purposely lose a game for my team when they all get fed.

By myself I cannot manage to win a game when the enemy team gets really fed.

THIS IS A TEAM GAME PLAIN AND SIMPLE.

Rank is therefore irrelevant as you do not choose who you are paired with.

It's to do with the subconscious. If your whole team is trash your subconscious will either say *lets carry des nuts* or *idgafyoloswag*. Same goes for others and they don't even realise.. There are patterns with players. If you carry so hard but the whole team is legit trash and you teach them how to play or literally call every good call but they don't wanna so  they all hate you for being honest, they will gang up on you and be entirely convinced it's you who is thee garbage.. But that's because they do about 100% of stuff-all. It's fckn physics m9.
Were you playing on a smurf? lol, If you were and its name was serenart. I'm sorry. I was the ryze :) - and this is exactly what happened in game.
